mapper.insert: insert into article ( title, articleType, summary, content, createBy, createTime, lastUpdBy, lastUpdTime ) values ( #{title}, #{articleType}, #{summary}, #{content}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{lastUpdBy}, #{lastUpdTime} )
mapper.select: select a.articleId, a.title, a.articleType, a.summary, a.createBy,a.createTime, a.lastUpdBy, a.lastUpdTime from article a left join clicks c on a.articleId = c.articleId where a.articleType = #{articleType }
mapper.insert: insert into subject ( articleId, difficulty, timeLimit, memoryLimit, otherLimit ) values ( #{articleId}, #{difficulty}, #{timeLimit}, #{memoryLimit}, #{otherLimit} )
mapper.update: update subject set difficulty = #{difficulty}, timeLimit = #{timeLimit}, memoryLimit = #{memoryLimit}, otherLimit = #{otherLimit} where articleId = #{articleId}
mapper.select: select tagName from tag where tagId = #{tagId }
select tagId, count(articleId) articleNum from article_tags group by tagId

select t.tagId, count(at.articleId) articleNum from tag t, article_tags at where t.tagType = #{tagType} and t.tagId = at.tagId
group by at.tagId
select count(articleId) from article_tags where tagId = #{tagId }
